name: Cat-Cara
description:
This page contains downloads for both the Trijam and Minijam versions of the game. If you're here from Minijam, please rate the Minijam version. If you're here from Trijam, be aware that the Trijam version is the one that was made in approx. 3 hours; the Minijam one took much longer.

---

cascara tea - A fruit tea made with the dried skin and pulp of the coffee cherry

Play with kitties and try out the cascara tea at this cat cafe!

Story, art, music and programming by me.

Fonts: "Architects Daughter" by Kimberly Geswein, "Berkshire Swash" by Astigmatic

This game was made with Twine in 3 hours and 6.5 minutes for Trijam 120. The theme was "Coffee". This was my first Trijam and first time making a game with SugarCube (story format in Twine). It was interesting to see how fast I could work!

A more polished version of this game with extra story was also made for Minijam 80. The theme for that jam was "Cats" and the surprise limitation was "8x8 textures" (hence why the art is all 8x8 pixels).
